SourceText: You and your family are facing a challenging time. {prog_name} provides tips on how you can support your child during this crisis. Would you like to recieve your first tips now?
New tips are ready for you. Would you like to continue now?
‚ú® Today‚Äôs tips can help your child feel more safe. Would you like to learn more?
üíõ We‚Äôre thinking of you today. There are simple things you can do to help your child cope. Would you like to learn about them?

üïäÔ∏è In tough times, children notice more than we think. Today‚Äôs tips help you talk to your child about death so they can feel safer, less confused, and more supported. Would you like to receive the tips?
üí° Many parents are having quiet talks with their children about staying safe. Today‚Äôs tips explain how to keep your child safe from harassment in a calm, age-appropriate way.
Would you like to receive them?
üíõ Keeping kids safe can feel overwhelming, but a clear plan helps. Today's tip shows you simple ways to help your child feel safe and supported in uncertain times.
Would you like to continue now?
üíõ In stressful moments, even simple actions can help keep your child safe and close. Today‚Äôs tips share how to stay connected and calm when traveling.
üíõ It can be frightening to think about traffickers, but talking with your child helps protect them. Today‚Äôs tip shows you simple ways to keep your child safe and aware.
üíõ Sometimes families need to stay in a shelter during emergencies or unsafe times. Today‚Äôs tip shares simple ways to help your child feel safe and cared for there.
üïäÔ∏è In times of crisis, some children may hurt others with words or actions because of fear or stress. Today‚Äôs tip shows you how to recognize bullying and protect your child.

üíõ Children often turn to phones and the internet to learn, play, and connect, but sometimes they can also be bullied online. Today‚Äôs tip helps you notice the signs and keep your child safe and supported.
This time is difficult. It doesn't seem like you have the time for the these tips right now. When you are ready to keep going, press 1.
